metadata.title: CVE-2014-8760 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
ejabberd before 2.1.13 does not enforce the starttls_required setting whencompression is used, which causes clients to establish connections withoutencryption.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8760` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ejabberd - 14.07-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ejabberd package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '14.07-3').
